column4: why is my wifi card coming up as eth1? i have a dell latitude d420, and my wifi card wont work, can anyone hellp?
mine comes up as eth1 too
do u have a dell latitude d420?
Dell inspiron 5100
does your wifi card work?
yes it does
what chipset is your ethernet card?
go to a terminal, type sudo lspci
lspci will tell you the chipset of the card
you'll need ndiswrapper and the windows drivers to make that one work
my wlan card is based on the BCM4300
is mine a broacom?
yes it is
0c:00.0 Network controller: Broadcom Corporation BCM94311MCG wlan mini-PCI (rev 01)
so i should download the xp drivers for it, and run it with wine and it will work?
no, you wont use wine
you'll use the windows wireless drivers tool that i pointed to you.  system -> Administration -> windows wireless drivers
so i should download the broadcom Corp BCM94311MCG  , then run the windows wifi installer?
so i should download the broadcom Corp BCM94311MCG  , then run the windows wifi installer?
yes
where do i find driver?
i'd say try broadcom's website
